annotations:
Doc-No. 15746459   15/AUG/2024 (THU)  10:24  (+0200)  DV
Visser & Visser Chartering BV - Vlaardingen (NL)
Phone : +31 10 4115620
PLEASE PROPOSE FOR:
MV HR Pearl  -  POINTE NOIRE-CABINDA RGE 24/26 AUGUST (ex our c/p)
- geared Singledecker
- blt 2010
- flag Panama
- 6500 dwat on 6,6 m ssw
- loa abt 104,20 m / beam 17,20 m
- gt/nt abt 4.559 / abt 2.497
(vsl below 5000 gt, ets / eexi exempted)
- 2 holds / hatches folding type covers
- 3 x 30 ts cranes combinable 60 ts (no spreader on board)
- abt 8.391 cbm grain capacity
- tt strength 15ts/sqm
- mech vent / co 2 ftd / cement holes
- abt 10.00 kn on abt 9,00 mts ifo 180 cst
+ abt 1.0 mts mgo
in port: abt 1,50 mts mgo idle / 2,5 mts cranes working
- ada
Any direction, incl period tc.
Thanks and best regards
Dirk VISSER - ph +31104115620
Mob/What's app     +31653143975 / skype  dirk.visservisser
